results.name: Riordan array (1/((1-4x)c(x)),xc(x)/sqrt(1-4x)), c(x) the g.f. of A000108.
comment: Columns include A032443,A002457,A018218,A038836. Row sums are A100192. Diagonal sums are A113956.
formula: Riordan array ((1/(1-4x)+1/sqrt(1-4x))/2, (2x/((1-4x)+sqrt(1-4x)))); Number triangle T(n, k)=sum{j=0..n, C(j, j-k)C(2n, n-j)}.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 09 2005
